mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.name AS "name", a.address AS "address", a.owner AS "owner", a.phone AS "phone", a.bank AS "bank", a.industry AS "industry"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_client a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.remarks LIKE '%'||#{remarks}||'%' '%'+#{remarks}+'%' concat('%',#{remarks},'%')
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' '%'+#{address}+'%' concat('%',#{address},'%')
AND a.owner LIKE '%'||#{owner}||'%' '%'+#{owner}+'%' concat('%',#{owner},'%')
AND a.phone LIKE '%'||#{phone}||'%' '%'+#{phone}+'%' concat('%',#{phone},'%')
AND a.bank LIKE '%'||#{bank}||'%' '%'+#{bank}+'%' concat('%',#{bank},'%')
AND a.industry LIKE '%'||#{industry}||'%' '%'+#{industry}+'%' concat('%',#{industry},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_client( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, name, address, owner, phone, bank, industry ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{name}, #{address}, #{owner}, #{phone}, #{bank}, #{industry} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_client SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, name = #{name}, address = #{address}, owner = #{owner}, phone = #{phone}, bank = #{bank}, industry = #{industry} WHERE id = #{id}
